def_cn: （长期在外之后的）回家，归乡，归国
def_en: Your homecoming is your return to your home or your country after being away for a long time.

def_cn: （一年一度的）校友返校日
def_en: Homecoming is a day or weekend each year when former students of a particular school, college, or university go back to it to meet each other again and go to dances and sports matches.
